title: Online Library Education Program for Global Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen research competencies of global practitioners through blended learning (synchronous/asynchronous) in BYOD environments. Structured around strategies for utilizing academic databases, e-journals, and online resources tailored to language domain characteristics.

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more strategies to efficiently navigate discipline-specific electronic resources within 8 weeks
Learners can write a research proposal (within 15 pages) using academic databases and library digital tools by the project deadline
Learners can complete an APA-style reference list (10+ entries) using citation management skills acquired through asynchronous learning modules
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
